attributes.action: Create a law to stop bullies from harming people
attributes.additional_details:
I have been a victim of bullying myself and its not a nice experience. I have been hurt from it and so has many others.

4400 lives are lost a year due to bullying (facts from CDC suicide) which is a lot. 

If the government introduces a law to punish these kind of bullies then the rates of deaths due to bullying will reduce. 

With your helping we can stop bullying and help the people who suffer from it.
attributes.background:
Many people across the UK has been a victim of bullying. This ranges from physical or mental bullying, which can cause physical and mental damage to the victims. 
Bullying has been silence for too long and it needs to change now.
A law should be stated to reduce bullying and to punish the bullies.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like Parliament to change the law in order to prevent bullying.
